Extracted Variables:
- \( x \): number of cars
- \( y \): number of buses

Extracted Constraints:
- \( 4x + 20y \geq 300 \) (At least 300 employees need to be transported)
- \( y \leq 4 \) (At most 4 buses can be used)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize \( 10x + 30y \) (Minimize the total pollution produced)
